property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this creature evolves, draw a card. Then if you have more shields than your opponent, draw another card.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
■ Forbidden Star Evolution: When you put this creature, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a non-evolution RexStars, then put it underneath this creature and shuffle your deck. ■ When you put another RexStars, you may put the top card of your deck face up underneath this creature. ■ If this creature doesn't contain 6 or more cards, it can't attack or be chosen by your opponent. ■ When this creature contains 6 cards, each of your opponent's creatures gets -99999 power until the end of the turn.
{TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value:

{TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you cast this spell, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Reduce the cost of casting this spell by the number of that creature's cost. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ Shieldify one of your opponent's creatures. ■ Each of your creatures win all battles until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Add up to 2 cards from among them to your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then you may destroy all creatures that have power 6000 or less. ■ At the end of your turn, if 4 or more creatures were destroyed this turn, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value:
■ Forbidden Star Evolution: When you put this creature, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a non-evolution RexStars, then put it underneath this creature and shuffle your deck. ■ When you put another RexStars, you may put the top card of your deck face up underneath this creature. ■ If this creature doesn't contain 6 or more cards, it can't attack or be chosen by your opponent. ■ When this creature contains 6 cards, each of your opponent's creatures gets -99999 power until the end of the turn.
{TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} {JUSTDIVER} (When you put this creature, it can't be chosen by your opponent and can't be attacked until the start of your next turn.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Add up to 2 cards from among them to your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then you may destroy all creatures that have power 6000 or less. ■ At the end of your turn, if 4 or more creatures were destroyed this turn, take an extra turn after this one.

If you do, put one into your graveyard and put the rest into your mana zone. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put up to one creature from your mana zone and/or graveyard that have total cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone. ■ While this creature is tapped, you can't be attacked.
